thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 2 of 111
thread.title: Sarah

author: Sarah
title: Sarah
text:
ezCater has made ordering lunch for of office so easy. They have a great selections of restaurants and many tat would normally be out of our delivery range but still deliver to us. We've found some really great new places because of ezCater, and people have stopped complaining about lunches always being from the same 5 places.
The only easy this is a four star review and not a five star review is because the delivery fee can be a little high. I may switch to pick up and start getting the orders myself.
